recipe.title: Balsamic Bean Dip with Fresh Veggies
ingredients: 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar plus extra for drizzling
Oil from jar of sun-dried tomatoes
instructions: Puree beans, olive oil, and 1 tablespoon vinegar in processor until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to bowl. Drizzle with tomato oil and a few drops of vinegar. Serve with crudités and pita wedges.
